block.p: INC., Kansas City, Mo., a preparer of income tax returns and related services, said it was changing its logo and would put the branding name of H & R Block Financial Advisors on many of its business units as it tries to emphasize its transition from a tax preparer to a financial services company.

RALCORP HOLDINGS INC., St. Louis, said that 322 workers, or about 8 percent of its work force, at its Ripon Foods Inc. cookie plant in Ripon, Wis., went on strike at midnight over wage and benefit issues.
INFOCURE CORP., Atlanta, a maker of software that helps doctors manage their practices, will cut 400 jobs and close offices to reduce costs after completing six acquisitions this year.
MGM, Santa Monica, Calif., owner of one of the world's largest film libraries, acquired the rights to 11 more Woody Allen movies, bringing the number of the filmmaker's titles MGM owns to 19.
